messages.title: WE CAN'T GO ON LIKE THIS. IT'S TIME FOR CHANGE.
messages.content: The general election is just weeks away now. This is a big mother of all elections. It comes at a time when our economy is in steep trouble, we need to mend our broken society and rebuild trust in our political system. We can't go on like this. That means change to get the economy back on track - to relieve the pressure on our health service and bring new ideas and energy for our future.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Conservatives have plans to make the most of it.
Will protect spending on the NHS and improve it for everyone.
Will stand up for families, sort out our schools and fight back against crime.

issues.economy: Plans to make the most of it.
issues.health: Will protect spending on the NHS and improve it for everyone.

leaflet.personalStatement: For the past three years I have been working hard for our town. Your support, policies & about everything else. Worked hard and I am proud of it. Hope.

politicalExperience.achievements: Started a Jobs Club, which has been attended by almost 100 loval people; many out of work for the first time. Run a back to work fair been attended by over 600 people. Conducted over 300 'one-to-one' advice surgeries with Warrington residents. These sessions have enabled me to help many people and have prepared me and our team for the future.
